title: Compiler panic on `cargo +nightly test --all-features`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.49.0-nightly (a1dfd2490 2020-10-05) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C prefer-dynamic -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

#0 [codegen_fn_attrs] computing codegen attributes of `quote::__private::push_pound`
end of query stack
error: could not compile `zbus_macros`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name zbus_macros --edition=2018 zbus_macros/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --emit=dep-info,link -C prefer-dynamic -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --test -C metadata=cbc07e92ad333fef -C extra-filename=-cbc07e92ad333fef --out-dir /home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps --extern proc_macro_crate=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libproc_macro_crate-a39458da35e20ba7.rlib --extern proc_macro2=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libproc_macro2-6853290c5739ec5d.rlib --extern quote=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libquote-ab332d09c2bc17ce.rlib --extern serde=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libserde-08e957a3740c3b39.rlib --extern syn=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libsyn-04adfc23a785c136.rlib --extern zbus=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libzbus-a2365ac682edbe09.rlib --extern zvariant=/home/zeenix/checkout/zbus/target/debug/deps/libzvariant-acc55b742ea7b295.rlib --extern proc_macro` (exit code: 101)
```
